metadata.title: CVE-2021-30762 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 12.5.4. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that thisissue may have been actively exploited..

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30762` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.28.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.28.0-1ubuntu2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
